euclidean_distance <- function(q, p) sqrt(sum((q - p)^2))

obs_train <- list(
  obs_01 = c( 0, 3, 0),
  obs_02 = c( 2, 0, 0),
  obs_03 = c( 0, 1, 3),
  obs_04 = c( 0, 1, 2),
  obs_05 = c(-1, 0, 0),
  obs_06 = c( 1, 1, 1)
)

lapply(obs_train, function(x) euclidean_distance(obs_test, x))
